title: Iceland & the Northern Lights 4 Star
note:
Please note an extra fee applies for carry-on bag with WOW, only one small item (max. of 42x32x25cm / 17x13x10in) such as a small bag/backpack, laptop or a camera bag included in fare.

IMPORTANT: The excursion to see Northern Lights may be cancelled or rescheduled locally due to unsuitable weather conditions.  No refunds will be given in this event. The Northern lights are a natural phenomenon and sightings can never be guaranteed. Every effort will be made to schedule the excursion for a suitable evening depending on the current Aurora forecasts
